sub_title: Senior Business Process Manager| Leader |Lean Six Sigma Black Belt | Operational Expert | Transformation -  at A.P. Moller - Maersk
summary:
As a shipping and logistics specialist with 20 years of experience, a master black belt, and a visionary person. I always challenge the status quo and drive continuous improvement. I deliver results by inspiring and leading teams with and without authority!

With 20 years of experience in the Maersk Line in the Operations department. My work life now sits at the intersection of the following skills and competencies: 

1. 𝐓𝐞𝐜𝐡𝐧𝐨𝐥𝐨𝐠𝐲: Currently working as a product owner and responsible for changing one of the company's legacy systems for the last three decades with a new futuristic system. My responsibility as 'Tracking visibility PO' was to ensure the system was user-friendly. Communicating to the entire user base of 11,000+ users. Taking my communication and change management skills to new levels to ensure success.

2. 𝐎𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬: Started at the operator level and quickly claimed the leadership ladder in the shipping and logistics industry. I have gained in-depth knowledge of the operational aspects of shipping. On the way, I also gained knowledge of the end-to-end shipping cycle. I have a customer-centric mindset and am obsessed with serving customers with second-to-none service. 

3. 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐮𝐨𝐮𝐬 𝐢𝐦𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐯𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭: Empowered by my Lean & Six Sigma Master black belt, I successfully delivered projects with varying degrees of complexity in my eight years of projects. I have done projects from standardization, system implementations, automation, outsourcing, cost saving, efficiency, etc. 

4. 𝐋𝐞𝐚𝐝𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐡𝐢𝐩: I naturally blended as a leader for a medium-large team. Spending significant time as a leader of multinational individuals also means I got the opportunity to set up a vision for the team and see it realized. I take great pride in mentoring and coaching my teammates who have gone ahead to become a leader.

5. 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: Transforming and improving is a must-have these days! My skills as a transformation manager have given me immense confidence to lead a team, department, or organization change successfully.  Implementing the learning about human behaviours and the law of diffusion of innovation have greatly helped me successfully implement change.

certifications.name: Optimal Product Management and Product Marketing
Six Sigma & Lean Black belt Certified
Six Sigma and lean Green belt certified

profile_positions.description: Part of a very strategic team responsible for making our hub terminals more efficient and helping deliver on our customers' promises.
profile_positions.title: Senior Business Process Manager

profile_positions.description: Platform Product Owner (PPO) for the lifeline of Maersk systems – RKEM modernization – The system tracks 4.1 million containers, which have 5 million daily transactions and is used by 11,000 users! The system was the best when it launched 30 years back and did the job perfectly. Now with the modern world of digitization, our customer's needs are changing and to serve our customers better, we need a new system – COMET! This is an exciting journey where I get to create something so cool! Which will become another legacy system for Maersk! Responsible for the modernization of one of the core systems, which tracks containers for Maersk. My role is to ensure that the user interface is great and develop the product as per the business needs. Responsible for the business cases.  I am also responsible for the change management of 11,000 users. I am working with 250+ focals from Operations and Customer Experience teams, collecting ideas and, validating them, converting them to new features that serve our users. Our vision is to empower operators to make better decisions by showing data more crisply and clearly, which triggers clear actions. The product is developed in-house using Agile methodology. We are serving our internal and external customers.
profile_positions.title: Platform Product owner (PPO) - COMET

profile_positions.description: Heading up cargo team in North European Liner Operations. Managing team of 12 people working 24X7, non24/ 7 and local operations teams in countries. As a leader defining the vision for the team and getting the team aligned and task prioritized to meet that vision.  We defined the task as being customer centric, operationally efficient and Cost reduction. Performance managing the team and ensure the team delivers on the safety and day to day is deemed as "must"in the team. Keeping the team collaborating with other teams and managing the upstream and downstream processes and stakeholders. Overall responsible for delivery of good customer experience by ensuring all planned cargo are loaded and discharge by terminal.
profile_positions.title: Cargo Execution Manager

profile_positions.description: Managing portfolio of project handled in Northern European Liner operations cluster .Maersk has 11 operations centers globally and our back office in India went thought a massive change management where I was directly responsible for implementing Maersk Operating system (MOS) in the NEULOC. Which included implementing standard work where we made every meeting standardized and optimized to ensure get best results and follow right cadence. Additionally, implemented performance management from Leadership team , functional teams and individuals having right lead measures and result measures. Also implemented functional people and skills development. Project allowed to change and optimize organisation results and collaborate on global level.
profile_positions.title: Portfolio Manager & Transformation manager

profile_positions.description:
Completed by Master black belt in Lean & Six Sigma from PMI. I have personally coached and certified 12 green belt and 2 black belt users. I have lead over 400+ projects from Standardization, Process optimization, System implementation, Efficiency projects, Cost projects and Customer satisfaction improvement projects. I have delivered approximately benefit of 50 million saving , people efficiency of 50+ users and implemented 5 global systems and created numerous global and local processes from the small and big projects.
* Prioritisation of projects based on benefits and resorce availibility
profile_positions.title: Manager Process and projects

profile_positions.description: Expariated to Rotterdam to handle cargo related activites in North European Liner Operations centre in Rotterdam, The Netherlands
profile_positions.title: Cargo controller

profile_positions.description: Leading team of 12 people handling load, discharge and back office activites in Mumbai for North European Liner Operations centre
profile_positions.title: Team leader North European Liner Operations
